865f98f4-2fc1-480c-909e-aa32616d9391.description: This badge earner can display job activity, and modify job attributes using SDSF. They can describe the process of job initiation and perform job management tasks such as; starting and cancelling a job, determining job delays, and displaying job step activity. This person can also display and manipulate job output and printers.

e59e2ae7-adba-47df-8787-5feb911b65e8.description: This badge earner can display health checks and interpret related messages and statuses. They can use SDSF to display JES2 resource shortages and can identify and respond to system requests. This person can describe how to perform a spool offload, manipulate JES2 node and line attributes, and display various z/OS system defaults.
